pkgmetadata.longdescription: The amdgpu-drm is a virtual ebuild. It will make sure that amdgpu drm module is compatible or have available the ioctls for both kernel and userspace drivers.

use.flag: Selects amdgpu-dkms as the DRM driver

Selects the in kernel sources which will contain the amdgpu DRM driver. Your kernel must reside or be linked at /usr/src/linux which the ebuild will scan /usr/src/linux/drivers/gpu/drm/amd/display/dc/dc.h
Selects rock-dkms as the DRM driver
